Windlord:

the male received the com  link and answered "I'll go as soon as=
 I can" and fired 2 feather missiles agaisnt Banzai-Tron


  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  S=
ent: Saturday, May 19, 2001 7:45 PM
  Subject: Chivtron


  ::Obfucious::
 =
     He stands out of sight on the bridge watching as people get their code=
s.  
  He walks off to an auxiliary computer.  "He comes in and thinks he r=
uns this 
  tech operation now.  We'll see about that."  He uses the comput=
er to take a 
  look at the program creating and controlling the shielding =
codes.  
  "Interesting work, I'm almost impressed."  He then sets about a =
flurry of 
  programing to duplicate the program.  It didn't take very long=
 because he had 
  a template by looking at Grounded's program.  He then cr=
eated four codes.  He 
  connected himself to the computer and downloaded o=
ne code.  With that done he 
  sets up a fire wall so that only he can get =
at this new program.  He opens a 
  tight band com to Aerotaur, Perplex, an=
d Windlord.  "Please come to my 
  position."  He was going to offer a code=
 to Nightlight but he had seen her 
  receive one from Grounded.

  Your us=
e of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
